# Appendix {.unnumbered .appendix}

## R Version {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: r-version
#| echo: false
renv <- jsonlite::read_json("renv.lock")
```

This book was built using R version `r renv[[1]]$Version`.

### R packages

All R packages required to build this book can be found in the following table.

```{r}
#| label: tbl-package-versions
#| tbl-cap: "R packages and version numbers"
#| echo: false
pkgs <- unlist(lapply(renv[[2]], function(x) x[["Package"]]))
pkg_vs <- unlist(lapply(renv[[2]], function(x) x[["Version"]]))
nr <- ceiling(length(pkgs)/3)
pkg_df <- tibble::tibble(
  Package = pkgs,
  Version = pkg_vs
)
knitr::kable(
  list(pkg_df[1:nr,], pkg_df[(nr+1):(2*nr),], pkg_df[(2*nr+1):length(pkgs),]),
  booktabs = TRUE
)
```

### Quarto

This book is built with Quarto, using version number `r quarto::quarto_version()`.
